definition[0]: someone with piercing eyes is looking at you and seems to know what you are thinking
example[0]: There was mockery now in those piercing blue eyes.
example[1]: She felt foolish and unsure under his piercing gaze.
example[2]: He gave her a piercing look.
definition[1]: a sound that is piercing is high, sharp, and unpleasant
example[3]: He grinned and let out a piercing whistle.
definition[2]: a piercing wind is very cold
example[5]: She felt a piercing sensation in her arm.
definition[4]: affecting your feelings very deeply in a sad way
definition[5]: a hole made through part of your body so that you can put jewellery there, or the process of making these holes
